intro.description: Hazel the squirrel wakes up to a bright morning in the forest. What will she do today?

oak_tree.description: You return to the familiar oak tree. The branches sway gently in the breeze.

birds_nest.description: You climb up to the birds' nest. The mother bird chirps anxiously.

nut_grove.description: Hazel finds a grove full of nuts, but also sees a hungry hedgehog.

riverbank.description: Hazel arrives at the riverbank. Robin the mouse is here, looking worried. The beaver is busy with his dam.

meadow.description: The meadow is full of wildflowers and butterflies. It feels peaceful here.
